website_summaries.verdict: By including an illuminated screen, Nintendo has finally fixed the original Game Boy Advance's biggest flaw.
pros: compatible with all current GBA games and most accessories
cons: Can't swap in standard batteries in a pinch

customer_reviews.title: Arrived completely damaged.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived completely damaged... this is not an acceptable condition. I am going to demand a replacement or a refund, and compensation for wasting my time...
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Tumbaga

customer_reviews.title: Got what i wanted 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Gba sp came today, was really nervous because I knew that there were two models (AGS-101 that has back lighting and I did get) and AGS-001 which some places sell because no body wants that model because it has poor front lighting and many don't no the difference and get ripped off. but I got the better model (AGS-101) and I'm 100% satisfied. Barely scratched came with charger and everything works. Just it didn't have the label that would show which model it was, so it may or may not be its original top screen but it's bright like ds lite bright.
customer_reviews.author: John Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Great item and great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Little to no visible scratches unless looking, screen is in perfect condition, came fully charged so i could test it immediately ( no issues whatsoever ), came in a little plushbag with a cleaning cloth, mario game works great, charger funtions properly, and based on a shipping time of 5 days - 3 weeks it got here in 3 days. Extremely satisfied and I highly recommend this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fatula

customer_reviews.title: but other than that pretty good. Different screen
customer_reviews.text: This would be 5 stars if the screws on the bottom of the game boy weren't missing, but other than that pretty good. Different screen, used but looks brand new, no scratches, came with a charger, games work, buttons work great, it charges. It is not broken this person took time to package it Tightly and securely & took great care of it. He/She did a nice job. What I think is that this gameboy has been modified, I might be wrong. Thanks. When I buy used items I take time and care to inspect the item completely. Great job. (The lost star was because of the missing screws on the bottom of the device.)
customer_reviews.author: Ethyn T.

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN BEYOND CONSUMER USE
customer_reviews.text: Item from Ravenholm was broken beyond use and only good for repair purposes, despite being listed in "very good" condition. I was expecting scratches and scuffs, but I wasn't expecting a cracked screen, a shrill sounding charger, and a system which shut down any time something remotely important occurred in a game. Unfortunately that's what I got. Very disappointing and frankly misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Julien Belair

customer_reviews.title: Battery was badly used up. Only had 3 hours of play on it before u needed to charge.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine but I had to buy a new battery for it. Only lasted like 3 hours. And we all know most games of the day were meant to be binge played. Didn't like having to be stuck right next to a plug to keep playing a longer harder game or in the case of doom simply having to stop to charge up if I've been rocking out for a while. Can't play a bit at night then not recharge in the morning ornit will poop out before u realise it.
customer_reviews.author: VOID

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful of Sosa Games
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy from Sosa games. "Good" condition. It looks like someone took sand paper to it. It's a dull grey when it should be silver. Even the hinge doesn't stay closed, and the screen is scratched on top of that. Then, the screen is hardly bright. Very dissatisfied. Not as bad as others, but still not great.
customer_reviews.author: Kye

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: So I was skeptical at first on what would arrive. Would it be something defected or something that just needs to have some minor items to fix. But what I did not expect was to receive a Nintendo DS. I ordered the gameboy SP as advertised which is in the receipt that was listed and found inside my package. But instead I received a Nintendo DS only worthy to sell as parts. Will be returning. Remember if something is too good to be true. It is.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product in acceptable condition. I would not say that it is acceptable. The internal battery and clock have run dry and the screen is so poor that I cannot see in tunnels or water when playing Pokémon. The pictures compare my original sp (grey) and the one I purchased from here (black). This picture actually makes the screen look better than it is. Had to purchase a new sp NOT from amazon that actually works. Shown with screenlight on in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I hate to say it was below ok
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived I was excited then disappointed, charged it over night, the next morning I flipped the switch that said “ON” nothing happened, for a while I was trying to get it to work, so I took the battery out, i pushed and put pressure on the battery when it was in the console it worked, I played game and decided I was going to put in a gameboy game, when I put it in the sound shut off, so I put a GBA game back in, no sound, worked more with the battery and got it working again still acts up I recommend you get one from EBay my experience was pretty bad
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: I'm really really happy that I got a week ahead from the original ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really really happy that I got a week ahead from the original date !!! It works really well like if it was new !! ;) I will definitely recommend this to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns out you can buy a good quality Gameboy on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy a gameboy on amazon, feeling like I may get scammed or not a system in good condition. I was proved wrong with this seller and item. It said it was in “very good” condition, and that is truth. My gameboy advance sp was in great shape and fully functional. All my games work on it. No issues. And it was a decent price. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BrickyardDrifter

customer_reviews.title: More than happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I read peoples’ reviews and decided to pay a bit more for a system. I bought mine from the seller called Carlton Factory. The condition of the system was “Very Good” but when I received it, I was absolutely over the moon. Everything works, all keys, speakers, little to no scratches. The only parts that seems worn is the tag on the back, but only a tiny bit, and a very small fin-ate scratch on the screen. There is some small specks of dust between the glass and the screen, but that was a manufacturing error! I am extremely happy with this purchase and would recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Aero

customer_reviews.title: Like new!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, the advances aren't made anymore so I wasn't exactly expecting perfection. I thought I was going to get something that had some minor bumps and dings and issues but as soon as I got it in the mail, everything was there - the original charger, the original box, and even the handheld played like new. Very few scratches and the screen was near perfect. Whoever had this prior to me kept very good care of it and it definitely helped the nostalgia trip into Pokemon Crystal. Threw me all the way back to being a kid! Thoroughly impressed and above and beyond what I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Mara Skathi

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: The original was great, I had one and only stopped playing it because I lost it in the move. Got this one for my step son. It came in pretty scratched up, totally expected, it's used. However, I did expect it to work, plugged it in with the charger that came with it, checked on it about an hour later wouldn't turn on. Tried it with my old charger, wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: (Bought from seller CaveGamers) Both system and charger work perfectly. The outside of the system is a bit more roughed up than expected, but nothing that effects the its performance. The scratches on the outside look worse than they are. If you run your fingers over them, it honestly feels like there's not even anything there. The inside is damn near perfect; not a single scratch, smudge or mark of any kind on the screen or lower half with the buttons. Very pleased overall
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: It’s great but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly well! I had lost a previous gba because it was stolen and I didn’t want to spend the money GameStop was offering again so I looked online. It works great, however there are two major downsides. 1. The charger that came with it, although it works, if you’re playing with it plugged in, it will still slowly lose battery. It’s not horrible but just keep that in mind. 2. It came in looking pretty beat up. Honestly nothing horrible, it doesn’t hinder its playability at all. So if you’re that picky, then I guess it’s a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: perfect perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect perfect perfect! what is there to know about the sp? charge lasts long, screen has a backlight (which isn't that bright but what do you expect from a 10 year old piece of technology), and can play gbc games as well as advanced games. i highly suggest degrading to the sp for classic games and something to throw in yr bag for commutes/trips/waiting in line/standing in an elevator/sitting in a waiting room.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Crap..... not good condition
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great BUT the battery that cam with it is crap... won’t hold a charge...! As well as a bad battery I was sent a non working ( crap ) charger for is as well.. Just a paper weight without a good battery... should have had a discount for the crap battery that came in it..🤬 DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER..🤬🤬🤬 I’d give 0 stars if I was able to.
customer_reviews.author: Robert crane

customer_reviews.title: more scuffed up than expected but it works okay
customer_reviews.text: Gave away my own GBA SP to my little sister like a decade okay. I got nostalgic since I still had most of the games for it and had stopped playing PC games for awhile. It's a fun little device. Really though Nintendo, it took you this long to create a back-lite handheld? You're lucky Atari Lynx and Sega Game Gear were battery hogs that didn't get proper support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Everything appeared to be in good condition; it even included the charging cord. However, the screen does NOT light up enough to even play a game. Was really looking forward to playing again. This is truly disappointing. I can’t believe someone thought that condition was good enough to send out and charge $100.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good audio, good battery, hardly any scratches, dim screen
customer_reviews.text: Received my Gameboy ahead of schedule. It doesn't have that many scratches on it, however the screen's brightness is a bit dim on the upper left-hand corner of the display. The system speaker was intermittent at first, but with a thorough cleaning via a can of air, the speaker freed up and started playing audio normally. Once I put a game cart into the gba, the screen makes a 1 pixel wide vertical red line on the far right-hand side of the screen once it moves past the "Gameboy" bootup screen. Pros: Gameboy came in good physical condition Cons: Screen could have been better. P.S. Seller was Gladiator Gamez.
customer_reviews.author: B.R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Screen and Buttons in Fantastic Condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Used - Acceptable SP from Sosa Games and it works perfectly. The screen and buttons are in very good condition, it charges just fine, and the battery lasts for about 4-5 hours with the light and sound on. The only "issue" I've had so far is that the battery light seems to be miswired, since the light will flicker from green to red sometimes even if the SP is fully charged. Hardly an issue though since it charges and holds charge just fine. I really recommend this to anyone looking to replay their childhood games or get into retro gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The item was filthy.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time which I greatly appreciate. However the gameboy was covered in dirt and other, unknown sticky substance, that was not residue of stickers. It looks like it’s been sitting in someone’s food pantry for a month. This I do not appreciate when I perches an item that says it’s in very good condition. That is something I expected when it says poor condition.
customer_reviews.author: Faryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: No Charger and Really Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disapointed because it claimed to have come with a charger but I didn't get one. The packaging was pretty bad, just in an envelope and was in a sandwich baggy for some reason? It's also pretty scuffed outside. It turns on but I'd don't know how well it plays games because I don't have a charger and I don't want it to die in the middle of playing. However it was the model number I wanted and wasn't the knock off that other people seemed to have gotten. I'm pretty excited to have this system though. It was the first system I ever got myself as little kid. I saved money for like a year to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Best GameBoy, period!
customer_reviews.text: Best GameBoy ever. Period. A Backlight, recharable batteries, folds to keep the screen safe and plays GameBoy, GameBoy Color & GameBoy Advance games. A newer battery seems to last around 10 hours, no less than 8 when charged. And it charges fairly quick. The charger cord seems like it's 10' long. You can play and charge easily. No other GameBoy has all the features of the GameBoy Advance SP. If you can, try to find the model with the brighter backlight. You'll have to do some research to find out the info. But worth it.
customer_reviews.author: justinM10

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL AGS 101 colors were used fro AGS 001 japanese market
customer_reviews.text: I looked for the known AGS 101 console colors and bought my item. After getting it and seeing it was an AGS 001 model I checked online as I wanted a backlit model. I found out that the colors used for the US AGS101 backlit models were also used on standard AGS 001 frontlit models in Japan. I had to initiate a return for mine and now realize it is VERY hard to tell which model is being sold
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: CURSED! DO NOT BUY! WIPES UR GAME COMPLETELY!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product no stars I would. They should consider that a blessing. The product is awful and completely wiped all of my files from the game I tested it on which had years of investment. At least a decades worth of game play. I'm livid. It single handedly wiped out my childhood in the course of 5 seconds. It took 6 tried so load and get passed the Nintendo screen, which wouldn't even say Nintendo. It glitched out and started screeching at me the first time I tried to play the game. The second time it froze. Not worth the time or money and I'm definitely reporting this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Charger - Big Problem
customer_reviews.text: Looks like someone rubbed it on asphalt for about 20 minutes. It was t charged and came with no charger. Seller made sure to point out the disclaimer *Used and no accessories included*. Thing looks like a coin flip it will work and straight out of the box you cannot play. You will need to go back and get seperate charging accessories. Be sure to double check other sellers offers.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The outside is a little scratched but I expected that. The light for the screen is weird but works and I don’t know if that’s how it’s made or something else. The light is in front of the screen. Anyway, the reason for 3 stars is because the speaker connection is loose. I turned it on once and there was no sound until I tapped the top a couple times. Overall it works with a couple flaws so I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: James McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I took a while to write the review because I wanted to test the machine for a few days. I give the seller 5 stars because it was exactly as described, no hidden surprises. The gameboy has some wear on the outside (as previously described on item's description) and that's about it. The buttons, hinge and screen are solid. The battery has given me about 4 hours of gameplay on a single charge so far without showing the low batt indicator. Thanks to the seller for keeping this piece of our childhoods in good co dition so others can enjoy once again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's always a slightly scary process buying something that's used, but this Gameboy arrived *exactly* as advertised, well packaged and working beautifully. My son was thrilled when he received it as a bday gift today (he collects old xibsoles).
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gameboy
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these things since I was a little kid. But my parents would not let me have this console. As an adult, I went ahead and bought the console, and I love it. One thing I will mention is that this device is smaller than I remember it being. But it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It showed up on time however it does charge the device at all. The only thing I can think to fix the problem is to replace the battery but there are, what seems to be tamper stickers on the device where the battery is and I worries that if the replacement battery does not fix the problem that I will be unable to get my money back. Buyer beware. Got a new battery and the gameboy still wont charge. Must have something wrong with the charging port. I wouldn't recommend buying this as it doesnt seem the gameboy was actually tested fully to make sure it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed due to model not being ags101 but happy to have older model anyways
customer_reviews.text: Works well but not an ags 101 model. I researched before buying and pearl blue was supposed to be specific to that model and for those who don't know the ags 101 model has the better backlit screen vs the front light screen of the ags 001 model. I'm disappointed that this was not the better model since it should've been due to the color of the Gameboy but overall I'm still happy to purchased so I could relive a small part of my happy childhood memories
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: A little rough...
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged perfectly and arrived on time. I have been having issues charging it, and the scratches on the exterior make it look pretty rough. The inside is great though. The screen has no scratches. My "select" button has an issue with sticking and working once in awhile. Overall, I'm happy with it and it is worth the money for theoat part. UPDATE: Hibernation mode does not work. My battery has yet to die so I am still unsure of whether or not it can be charged/ if the charger works.
customer_reviews.author: Kara West

customer_reviews.title: Always a gamble
customer_reviews.text: Each product and it's damage is going to be different, however I feel like they should inform you of defects before you buy. Would've given it 5 stars if it weren't for the damage on the screen, and the battery light not working properly (switches from red to green constantly.) Scratches are also present of course but that's also a given, I wouldn't consider chipped edges and dents "light use" though..
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The screen is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The screen barely lit up, and it has a horrible effect that makes it impossible to really play games in it. I keep playing my games in my regular Gameboy Advance. I asked for a refund from the seller, I would have been able to return the product, but they never contacted me back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shields

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of which version of GBA SP you purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's fine gameplay-wise, but in appearance, it's heavily lacking. There's a carving of the previous owner's name on the side of this device and the backlight isn't nearly as bright as later produced versions. It's passable to say the least, but not impressive in my own opinion. Ah, and when the package arrived, the box was half-opened. I'm not certain who's to blame for that slip-up, but it makes the presentation even worse upon opening said package.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is no headphone port
customer_reviews.text: I only ever made the hop straight from the GameBoyColor to the DS Phat, never playing or caring about the gameboy advanced games. Coming back to my Color, I forgot how great it was to not have to plug in a light just to see the screen. The back-lighting is great and the size of the system itself is pretty nice. I'm really glad I can still play the old GB games too plus finally extend my GBA game library. Only downside is no headphone port, which can be annoying when wasting time in public. Though there's probably an extension which allows this, I'm surprised there was not one on the system to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Only worked on 1 of 4 games that I tried to play.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked on 1 of 4 games that I tried to play. All games where tested on other hand helds. Now I am stuck paying for shipping becuase this seller has bad QA or was just trying to make money from a broken product. I will never buy from this seller agian.
customer_reviews.author: jerry5234

customer_reviews.title: My favorite GBA to date
customer_reviews.text: I spent so many hours on this thing, that I still get flashbacks of playing on it when I listen to certain music. It was backlit, had great sound, awesome battery life, rechargeable, and compact, but still big enough to hold. Admittedly, my man hands would feel cramped after an hour or two, but any serious gamer fights through that. I have a 3DS XL now, but I'll never forget this little guy. I should mention, I've owned every worthwhile version of the Game Boy to date (read: not virtual boy, not micro game boy). This comes in at a close third.
customer_reviews.author: Nomnom

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in seemingly-pristine condition. Was very impressed and excited, until I turned it on and felt the power button jiggling loosely as the power cut in and out randomly. Useless. I should have known, after reading other reviews stating this is a known problem with this seller. But I figured since it’s one of the cheapest sellers of the GBA SP on here, it was worth the risk. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a used, older model electronic product for my son, but he specifically wanted this model. It was like-new, as-represented item. It arrived on time and appropriately packaged. No scratches or dings on the outside, no scratches on screen, and it came with a charger. Everything worked just fine and he loves it. I purchased a game separately. He is enjoying this very retro purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my girlfriend since hers broke when she was younger and we are both disappointed. She tried to play it today and turns out, it didn't have battery and the screen shows up all white! I can't return it either because it's been too late! If you order one of these, please check it before you lay it down somewhere. I wish we had checked it months ago when I ordered it. Now, I have a Gameboy that is useless...
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Works phenomenally! Very few dead pixels, and they're only noticeable if you look closely. The case is barely scratched and looks brand new. All buttons are in working order and it properly saves games. I never got to have one of these when I was a kid, and now I get to play my GameBoy games the way they were meant to be played!
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Alexandre Blaiddyd

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I just received my gameboy advanced sp and well the condition, to be quite frank... is not worth the 60$... it is scratched all to hell... I’m pretty disgusted... the first time I put one of my games in it, it didn’t even read that it was there. I was really excited about this because I had one as a kid, the same color and everything. I played the hell out of mine for years and it was in better shape than this one... I really want at least a partial refund. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Best Childhood Item Ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'm allowed to commend the seller for the quality of this item, but it works great and is in great condition. Definitely my favorite version of the gameboy/gameboy advanced. I wish I would have saved mine; I didn't know it would go up in value like this! Color of the shell is nice, and screen is in great shape too. I never had a DS or anything like that and I just wanted to play pokemon so yay childhood memories. Thanks Gameboy for eating up all my time.
customer_reviews.author: kbrooks311

customer_reviews.title: Get it nowwwww
customer_reviews.text: I love it. In my opinion, absolutely flawless, small scratch on the back that's barely noticeable even if you look for it. Works perfectly and smoothly, I got Crystal, Yellow, and red running like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: The lithium battery that replaces the AA batteries and the back lighting of the screen make it a comfortable enough console to play all the titles that go ...
customer_reviews.text: The Gameboy Advance SP, model AGS-101, is the bridge between the retro and the requirements that we take for granted in modern consoles. The lithium battery that replaces the AA batteries and the back lighting of the screen make it a comfortable enough console to play all the titles that go from the first gameboy, gameboy color and gameboy advance. The downside of this console is that it has no entry for standard hearing aids, so it is necessary to purchase an adapter that is not worth more than one dollar, but that is still an unnecessary concern, for a console that has almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect anything sleek.
customer_reviews.text: I know this was listed as used, but it was described as only having "a few" scratches on the back of its case. This whole thing is covered in signs of wear, including the screen. Hopefully I can refurbish it myself when I get the chance. Besides exterior, the functionality is questionable. After about an hour of game play it's apparent that the right bumper has response issues. I wish I had gone to a used game store and paid a little higher price if it meant I would get a better working/looking hand held.
customer_reviews.author: wesley a graham

customer_reviews.title: Item in Great Shape
customer_reviews.text: This item was sent wrapped up in tons of bubble wrap because of no original box. The item did have alittle wear & tare but obviously since the game boy advance is pretty old. Works great. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gemelle Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and did not match description
customer_reviews.text: Product was not in condition advertised, it was in worse not acceptable condition. Very scratched and had foreign debris in ports. To make matters worse it was sent with a charger that does not go to this console or fit in any ports so i do not know if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Far more than just a somewhat scuffed up outside. It appears as though a dog chewed on it and the screen was scratched. As well the devices internals aren't in the best condition. I had to restart the game several times just to get it to register there was a game in it and several more times to get it to stop freezing up during gameplay. I've owned SP's before and I know they shouldn't act like that. The L and R buttons don’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Grant

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully bright GBA SP
customer_reviews.text: Even though I love Nintendo, I never understood why they sell handhelds that are nearly too dark to see. I'd given up on my handheld and burned out wormlight until I saw Metal Jesus Rocks on YouTube explain which ones were backlit and which weren't. Thank you so much for backlighting this because I'm now re-addicted to all my old games AND buying new ones. It's awesome and so are you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I recommended for any Nintendo lovers who just want a little nostalgia! I found a bunch of gameboy games at a garage sale that I loved as a young child that I had to get them! I was a little nervous ordering a electronic online but it was worth it! It works perfectly and is in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Munson

customer_reviews.title: Works how I remember it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relive a piece of my childhood and have been surprised at how well it has worked! I have had to charge it maybe twice in two months of casual play and have had none of the errors I remember having when my first one became worn out. The display is bright and the casing has been well kept. I am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great Nostalgic Trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for her birthday because she loves old school mario! However, after drinking Conway PA water I have been stuck in the ICU for 5 months, a stuffed rabbit has been my only companion and she left me.
customer_reviews.author: Hux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the pictures showed. Yeah, it was scratched up, but I knew that when I bought it. It works fantastically, and the screen is bright and beautiful! My dad absolutely adores his b-day gift! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: ErinR

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, charger port is loose.
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect, the screen is the dimmer screen but I really don't care, once you play the game you don't even notice it after a while. The reason I gave this a 4 star is because this particular gameboy I ordered doesn't charge well. You have to make sure the wire is straight and put the charger in carefully. product_meta.title: Game Boy Advance SP - Flame
feature_bullets: This incredible redesign features a fantastic flip-screen; unopened, the unit fits easily in your pocket
When it's opened, gamers are in for a treat -- the screen can display up to 32,000 colors, and has a backlit screen for comfortable game viewing
Redesigned button and D-pad placement make for hours of more comfortable playing
Powered by a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery that provides 18 hours of play with the light off(up to 10 hours with the light on)
Games are backwards-compatible -- your Game Boy Advance games will play just fine on the GBA SP
